Year: 2025
Purpose: Showcase my skills, experience, and projects.
Features: Dark/Light theme toggle, multilingual support, responsive design, GitHub & LinkedIn integration.

Year: 2024
Purpose: Collect and analyze customer BP health data.
Features: Register/Login, Admin Dashboard, BP Chart, Add/Edit/Delete records.

Year: 2024
Purpose: A platform for users to collaborate and register for events.
Features: Collab requests, Profile creation/deletion, Accept/Deny requests, Event registration, Email verification.

Year: 2023
Purpose: Analyze airline booking data to detect seasonal & city-wise trends.
Features: Data cleaning, Chart visualizations, Analysis algorithms.

Year: 2021
Purpose: Learn full-stack integration with React & Express.
Features: Add, Edit, Delete, Create records.

pjData.pjSubHeading: React.js | Node.js | React-Bootstrap | AWS S3 & Lambda | SQL
pjData.pjText:
Year: 2020
Purpose: Keep customers engaged during production downtime.
Features: Spin the Wheel, Dino Game, Countdown Timer, FAQ.

Year: 2019
Purpose: Allow users to check in to the company's annual event via unique QR code.
Features: QR Code generation, KBC Quiz Theme, Dress Code, Travel & Event Routes, Dining.
